summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Southwest Kenyon Street from 46th Ave. Southwest to Fauntleroy Way Southwest; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18357 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
